editorialNotes.standard: Miniclipâ€™s 8 Ball Pool delivers a clean online billiards experience that awards players for speedy turns. We found ourselves collecting rare pool cues and training to clear tables faster, with higher scores and longer combos. An alluring level-up system and the ability to bet your in-game currency on the outcome of head-to-head matches makes jumping online for a quick game as rewarding as it is intense.Â
editorialNotes.short: Finally, we can put that trigonometry to use!

editorialNotes.standard: CSR knows how to supercharge a sequel. Drag-racing is as fun as ever - and you wonâ€™t believe how good it all looks. And now you can squash other players in Live Races, which is about as fun as it gets.
editorialNotes.short: Hit top speed and don't look back.

editorialNotes.standard: EA knows how to make a good sports game. Impressive visuals? Check. Great animation? Check. Fun? Double check. The meat and bones here is collecting players and handcrafting a team so good itâ€™d make Lebron and Steph jealous.

editorialNotes.standard: Enter the world of Rocky Balboa with this tactically rich boxing simulation. Whether you play as Adonis â€œCreedâ€ Johnson or design your own pugilist, dazzling graphics and fluid controls immerse you in the action. Swipe and tap to throw uppercuts and dodge body blows, maneuvering a global roster of opponents into position for the knockout. Training minigames upgrade your skills between bouts, but youâ€™ll need sharp eyes and quick reflexes to become the best.

editorialNotes.standard: Conquer street and sky in Gameloftâ€™s fastest racing game yet, a mix of high-octane driving and incredible jumps that harkens back to the age of San Francisco Rush and classic Burnout. Pairing white-knuckle action with an array of career and online modes, it sets a new standard for arcade racers on the App Store.
LeBron. Luka. Giannis. Step into the shoes of household NBA names and take to the court in stunningly realistic matchups.

ios.subtitle: Your Ultimate Team on the go

editorialNotes.standard: Always wanted to be a soccer star? Score! Hero puts you in the kit of a young upstart, making your way to bigger and better clubs. The controls couldnâ€™t be simplerâ€”simply draw a line where you want the ball to go, and let the action unfold. While the gameplay is easy to learn, Score! Hero also shines with depth, rewarding thoughtful passes and smart shots over wild swiping.

ios.subtitle: Kick the ball around the world

editorialNotes.standard: Grand Mountain Adventureâ€™s many mountains are packed with everything from long-jump challenges to twisty downhill runs peppered with bears and wolves. Whether enjoying a stress-free glide across the snow or double-backflipping off Finlandâ€™s peaks, we love how this game is as relaxing or challenging as we want it to be. With practice, the superb controls ensure that even the greenest novice can eventually feel like a pro.

name: Dumb Ways to Die 2: The Games

editorialNotes.standard: Wackier and more hilarious than ever, this sequelâ€™s still daring us to cheat death in entertaining ways. Weâ€™re always ready for shark hopping, volcano climbing, dragon grooming, and everything else these mini-games throw at us. The absurd goals and rapid-fire pace are a winning combo.
